name: Some kind of hate
description:
*That's my first game*

*Made on Stencyl*

Once, not extremely far ago, old circus lion was close to death. King of clowns for a long time tried to find a replacement for him until he met cute and beautiful cat. King stole that animal but he didn't know, who is his owner!

Some kind of hate is a platformer game where you become a little but clever boy. You get an opportunity to reach a dream of probably all kids - cold-bloodedly and brutally kill every clown. Save that cute cat, reach dream of every kid!
